snippet: At least 19 suspected Boko Haram fighters and two Chadian soldiers were killed in fighting on Friday.
abstract: Military official in Chad reports deaths of two soldiers and 19 suspected Boko Haram militants from Nigeria, killed when militants attacked village on banks of Lake Chad.
lead_paragraph: At least 19 suspected Boko Haram fighters and two Chadian soldiers were killed in fighting on Friday.

headline.main: Chad: Fighting Near Nigeria’s Border Kills at Least 21
headline.print_headline: Africa; Chad: Fighting Near Nigeria’s Border Kills at Least 21
